name: NLB Services / Next Level Business Services, Inc
description: NLB one of the fastest growing transformational workforce solution providers headquartered in Atlanta, with presence across 15 global locations. Powered by largest organic talent supplementation engine, strong digital capabilities and 8000+ strong team, NLB Services helps global enterprises reimagine their businesses to thrive in the digital age. Our vast global presence and unyielding customer centricity have enabled us to forge strategic partnerships with leading Fortune 500 companies, worldwide.
features: 200,000+ global resource pool in our talent community
business_objectives: Hire Top Talent Faster and More Efficiently
Headline: NLB is a fast growing workforce solution provider with global delivery capability
ShortDescription: NLB Services Reimagines businesses to stay one step ahead of the fast-changing world.

Highlights.name: Smarter Hiring
Highlights.description: AI & experts find perfect talent, faster.

Highlights.name: Digital Boost
Highlights.description: Automate tasks & accelerate transformation with RPA & AI.

enhanced_description: NLB Services, a rapidly expanding global workforce solution provider headquartered in Atlanta with a presence across 15 international locations, specializes in helping enterprises thrive in the digital age. Leveraging its industry-leading organic recruitment engine, a vast 200,000+ global talent community, and a robust team of over 8,000 professionals working on 900+ client projects, NLB delivers transformational workforce solutions. Their approach, including AI-driven Smarter Hiring and a Pre-vetted Talent Pool (ClearedTalent™), ensures rapid access to qualified candidates. Furthermore, NLB supports digital transformation by automating tasks and accelerating initiatives with RPA and AI capabilities, fostering strategic partnerships with Fortune 500 companies worldwide.
key_use_cases: Automation of business processes using RPA and AI
competitive_advantages: Experience with a high volume of client projects (900+)
Ability to accelerate digital transformation with RPA & AI
roi_benefits: Instant access to qualified and pre-vetted candidates
Enhanced business efficiency through task automation
Ability to secure top talent more effectively
primary_users: Client companies (Business unit leaders seeking workforce solutions)
scalability_features: Capable of serving Global and Large Enterprises
